text:
Ben and Michael argue at dinner and Hartsock says she may send them both home

The Bachelorette: Desiree Hartsock Goes on 'Most Awkward Date of My Life'

How do you say “awkward” in German?

On Monday’s episode of The Bachelorette, Desiree Hartsock heads to Germany and has her first two-on-one date.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

She called it “the most awkward date of my life” in her latest PEOPLE.com blog post. “I’ve watched two-on-one dates on TV, but having to live one was painful,” she wrote.

Michael and troublemaker Ben are both invited but with one rose at stake, things get very uncomfortable. Watch a clip below.

Over dinner Michael asks Ben why he doesn’t get along with the other guys in the house. Ben says he’s not focused on making friends but rather wants to get to know Desiree, which she seems to appreciate.

Later, when Desiree asks the guys about family traditions, Ben says he wants to go to church every Sunday with his family. But Michael calls him out, saying he didn’t attend an Easter service in Germany when all the other men did go.

“Every other guy was there except for you,” an irritated Michael says. “I thought that was odd.”

That’s when Ben decides to excuse himself.
title: The Bachelorette Desiree Hartsock's Most Awkward Date
